item.title: enableDebug
item.description: qrscanner.enableDebug() Type Function Return value none See also qrscanner.* Overview Enables additional output for debugging purposes. Syntax qrscanner.enableDebug()

item.title: show
item.description: qrscanner.show() Type Function Return value none See also qrscanner.* Overview Opens the scanner view. Syntax qrscanner.show(params) params required Table. Contains parameters for the call â€” see the next section for details. Parameter Reference The params table includes parameters for the call. topbar optional Table. Topbar options, see below for details. useFrontCamera optional Boolean. Set to true to use the front camera if it’s available.
